question: A CPU contains which of the following?
option1: A card reader and a printing device
option2: An analytical engine and a control unit
option3: A control unit and an arithmetic logic unit
option4: An arithmetic logic unit and a card reader
answer: A control unit and an arithmetic logic unit
explanation: CPU is the main processing unit of a computer system. It consists of a control unit and an arithmetic logic unit. A central processing unit (CPU) carries out the instructions of a computer program by performing the basic arithmetic, logic, controlling, and input/output operations specified by the instructions.
